synthesis_conditions.temperature: 200 °C for 16 h, then cooled to 100 °C over 4 h
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Cu(NO3)2·2.5H2O (480 mg, 2.50 mmol), K5CuPW11O39 (400 mg, 0.14 mmol), Trimesic acid (420 mg, 2.0 mmol), (CH3)4NOH (362 mg, 2.0 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with distilled water several times, then with saturated KCl solution and distilled water, sonicated 3 times for 30 min each
